attributes.action: Ensure that Britannia continues to be represented on the coinage of the realm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britannia no longer features on any new coin from 2008, yet Britannia has featured on our coinage since the time of Charles II.  A representation of Britannia appeared on the coinage of the Roman emperors Hadrian and Antoninus Pius.  For as long as we have an independent currency, let Britannia be seen on our coinage.
